snippet: Merida, the protagonist of Pixar’s “Brave,” is the studio’s first leading heroine, a Scottish princess who had several incarnations on her way to the screen.
abstract: Pixar Animation Studio film Brave features a female lead for the first time in its 17-year history; Merida, the empowered girl at the center of the film, went through several incarnations, design changes and two directors to get it right.
lead_paragraph: Merida, the protagonist of Pixar’s “Brave,” is the studio’s first leading heroine, a Scottish princess who had several incarnations on her way to the screen.

headline.seo: Pixar’s ‘Brave’: How the Character Merida Was Developed
headline.main: Evolution of a Feisty Pixar Princess
headline.print_headline: Evolution Of a Feisty Pixar Princess
